articles.title: GOP Lt. governor on Trump attacks: I'm not going to reply negatively
articles.description: Georgia Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan describes his reaction to President Donald Trump's continued attacks on Republican officials, including attacks aimed at him.

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: Trump's threats to democracy are going nowhere in court
articles.description: The repetitive and meritless legal challenges to the November 3 election results from President Donald Trump and his allies have sent one fundamental message: Millions of votes cast by their fellow Americans are worthless.

articles.title: 'Unconscionable': Lawmaker reacts to racist voicemails
articles.description: Michigan state Rep. Cynthia Johnson received violent, racist voicemails after she challenged election fraud claims from President Donald Trump's attorney Rudy Giuliani. Johnson responds to the voicemails in an interview with CNN's Erin Burnett.

articles.author: Esha Mitra, CNN
articles.title: India's rape laws don't cover transgender people. They say it's putting them at risk
articles.description: India has imposed tougher penalties for rape in recent years, after a series of sickening attacks on women and girls prompted nationwide protests. But activists say not enough is being done to protect other genders.
articles.content:
We must develop empathy for all and this includes male and transgender rape victims 
KTS Tulsi, Indian politician

articles.title: This designer wants to make gourmet food out of chicken feathers
